title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 2028 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
December 10, 2016

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 2028





On Saturday, December 10, 2016, the President signed into law:

H.R. 2028, the "Further and Continuing and Security Assistance Appropriations Act, 2017."Â
